name: Las Vegas Heatwave
addl_comm: Colours that I'm thinking of for this team could be black, white, orange, and sandy brown! I could also see a brick red or a gold fitting in here nicely, if you guys wanted to try that out, tol.  These all are pretty desert-y colours that also remind me of Vegas. In thinking of this name, I wanted something that reminded me of Vegas, but wasn't too on the nose (such as things like Gamblers, or Blackjacks, etc.). The first thing that came to mind was how hot it gets here, and I'm sure for a lot of people who are from out of town have that come to mind pretty quickly when they think of our city, too. I also think we needed something bold, but strong, just like the city this team is from.

name: Nobles
addl_comm: The noble gases are the most stable group of the chemical elements, and since the discovery of their complete outer valence shell of 8 electrons, myriad applications have been found for them, including gas-discharge lamps such as neon lights, which populate Las Vegas in numbers greater than the human inhabitants. Sources of voltage excite electrons to higher shells, and upon relaxation to the stable valence shell the shed energy is released in the form of light. Just like the electricity of the roots of people, culture, and infrastructure (Hoover Dam) of the city of Las Vegas will provide energy to the team and players of the Las Vegas Nobles (and vice versa), to excite them to higher shells of ability, skill, and teamwork, so that they might shed light upon the city of Las Vegas and the sport of lacrosse, in the unique and vibrant ways that only the nobles can.

name: Las Vegas Spikes
addl_comm: This name owes to Las Vegas‚Äô location as a centralized point between Salt Lake City and Los Angeles and its importance during the development of railroads in the West.  Spikes are a symbol of strength, toughness, durability, completion, and success in the railroad industry.  Spikes is a great name for the city of Las Vegas when taking its cultural and historical significance into account.

name: Las Vegas Mavericks
addl_comm:
This is cool for three reasons:
1. Homage to the Wild West and cowboys, which Nevada and Las Vegas are known for (think the Neon Cowboy too)
2. An Air Force reference, which resonates and pays homage to nearby Nellie AFB
3. May be a bit dated, but the best gambler in the Wild West‚Ä¶and last I checked Vegas is known for gambling.

name: Vegas Hitmen
addl_comm: Many places you look around town you will see an influence by, or an ode to, the mob. Good, bad, or indifferent, they played a vital role to the success of this town. Not only would this name be rooted in Vegas history but it would be one hell of an intimidating team name.

name: Las Vegas Nova/ Vegas Nova
addl_comm:
Nova come from supernova which is an exploding star.
 Much like Vegas being a beacon in the desert Las Vegas Nova will be a beacon for the Lax community.
 The logo could be a bright orange star on a dark background. It could also strongly bright colour that contrasts well and works to reflect the desert areas around Las Vegas and the bright lights of the city. 
With explosive plays and the explosive pace of the game I think it would work well reflecting both what the team is and the what the game is. 
Thank you for your consideration
